lead_paragraph: Liverpool have been fined 16,000 euros (£13,382) for an illicit banner and setting off fireworks during the Europa League finals in May, UEFA announced on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Liverpool and Sevilla Fined by UEFA Over Crowd Trouble
headline.main: Liverpool and Sevilla Fined by UEFA Over Crowd Trouble

snippet: Liverpool have been fined 16,000 euros (£13,382) for an illicit banner and setting off fireworks during the Europa League finals in May, UEFA announced on Monday....
